description:
Minecraft Sandbox Ixer 2 Only pc edition  is the updated version of Minecraft Sandbox Ixer 2 Construct 2 Edition, it is only for pc                                                       Controls of the game:

s - save to slot 1

l - load from slot 1

z -save to slot 2

x-load from slot 2

and for save on mobile click on buttons with text save slot 1, load slot 1,save slot 2, load slot2

use joystick on mobile phones to move

arrows- to move on pc

to create items click on inventory

esc-exit from the world, and button on the right side of the screen it to exit from the world                                    E -TO teleport to transformatorteleportator 3000
R to create first portal                                                                                              T to create second portal                                                                                                                       P -TO PAUSE GAME                                                                                                      O TO UNPAUSE                                                                                                                         1,2 TO CHANGE SKIN     ON MOBILE USE BUTTONS
